about_the_game:
Lead the TRAIN by sliding the rails.
Get the STARs!

This game is a sliding puzzle!
Slide the rails and lead the train to the goal.

RULE
- The train will start from the start station.
- You must lead the train to the goal station by connecting the tracks to the goal station.
- You must lead the train to the goal station when you pass the station.

Stage Editor
You can show your creation to players around the world.
Of course, you can also play other players' stages.

Upload the stage data created by the Stage Editor to the server via the Internet.
There are three conditions that must be met in order for a stage to be uploaded.
- The stage must have a start station and a goal station.
- There must be a rail that connects to the start station in the initial state.
- The placement of three stars.

Other users can play stages created by other users by selecting Stage > Online.

About Game streaming

The game is available for live streaming and video content creation. You are free to monetize your streams and videos without seeking permission.
Feel free to use the store URL in your stream description as well.
Enjoy and have fun!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3
  • Processor: Zen 2 4c/8t、2.4-3.5GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CU、1.6GHz
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3
  • Processor: Zen 2 4c/8t、2.4-3.5GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CU、1.6GHz
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sonoma
  • Processor: Apple M1またはインテルCore M
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple Sillicon M1 または Radeon Pro 555
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Sonoma
  • Processor: Apple M1またはインテルCore M
  • Graphics: Apple Sillicon M1 または Radeon Pro 555

name: Sliding Rails

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Graphics: Intel HD 600
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
